query:
SELECT
                i.id,
                i.name,
                i.enabled,
                i.error,
                MAX(up.scraped_at) AS last_scraped_at
            FROM
                indexers AS i
            LEFT JOIN
                user_profiles AS up ON up.indexer_id = i.id
            GROUP BY
                i.id, i.name, i.enabled
            ORDER BY
                i.id;
